WorkflowInfo.Name: Enable and disable list of users
WorkflowInfo.Description: Enable and disable specific users at the begining and end of working day
WorkflowInfo.XML:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ConvertToHTMLTable;Assembly=ConvertToHTMLTable, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SendEmail;Assembly=SendEmail, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:Wait;Assembly=Wait, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:ADEnableAccount;Assembly=ADEnableAccount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ADDisableAccount;Assembly=ADDisableAccount, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="1" TableName="Users" RowNumber="5" isEmptyGrid="0" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="UserName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>user1</UserName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>user2</UserName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>user3</UserName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>user4</UserName>
 </resultSet>
 <resultSet>
 <UserName>user5</UserName>
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /><ns1:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSet="%Users%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" ResultSetName="Users" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"><ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%Users%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="Users" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns7:ADEnableAccount IsValid="True" x:Name="adEnableAccount1" ADUserName="%UserName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-SERVER" DisplayName="AD Enable Account" Path="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory enable user account." Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" AccountType="User" HostId="40" TypeName="ADEnableAccount" UserName="" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns2:ConvertToHTMLTable Value="%Users%" IsValid="True" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" /><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="The follwoing users has been enabled" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, group or duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16618"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>%convertToHTMLTable1%</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /><ns4:Wait IsValid="True" x:Name="wait1" TimeInterval="" isDefault="0" DisplayName="Wait" TimeInSeconds="32400" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Pause workflow" TypeName="Wait" TimeValue="" Timeout="09:00:00" /><WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity2" Condition="{x:Null}"><SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity2"><ns5:ExitWhile IsValid="True" x:Name="exitWhile2" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" Description="Exit current while activity" DisplayName="Exit While" TypeName="ExitWhile" /><ns6:GetCellValue ColumnType="Number" IsValid="True" x:Name="UserName2" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%Users%" RowNumber="%exitWhile2%" ResultSetName="Users" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns8:ADDisableAccount IsValid="True" x:Name="adDisableAccount1" ADUserName="%UserName2%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="AD-SERVER" DisplayName="AD Disable Account" Path="{x:Null}" Description="Active directory disable user account." Password="" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" AccountType="User" HostId="40" TypeName="ADDisableAccount" UserName="" /></SequenceActivity></WhileActivity><ns3:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="The follwoing users has been disabled" DestinationNumber="1" x:Name="sendEmail2" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="-2" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, group or duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
<HTML><HEAD>
<META content="text/html; charset=utf-8" http-equiv=Content-Type>
<META name=GENERATOR content="MSHTML 10.00.9200.16618"></HEAD>
<BODY style="BACKGROUND-COLOR: white">
<P>%convertToHTMLTable1%</P></BODY></HTML>
" To="Admin" ShiftLevelCc="" MessageType="Custom" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
